attendance.title: Attendance
attendance.description: Every morning, teachers take attendance of their students during assembly and homeroom. Here’s a summary.

print.title: {{date, datetime(day: numeric; month: short)}} Attendance Summary
print.subtitle: Presented by MySK

chart.note: Chart guide: each group is a grade, including data during assembly (top) and homeroom (bottom). Late is pink, presence is blue, and absence is red.

participation.title: Participation
participation.description: Metrics on students and teachers participation in using the MySK infrastructure.

onboarding.content_one: <0>{{count, number}} onboarded user</0> from a total of {{total, number}}. That’s {{percentage, number(style: percent; maximumFractionDigits: 0;)}}.
onboarding.content_other: <0>{{count, number}} onboarded users</0> from a total of {{total, number}}. That’s {{percentage, number(style: percent; maximumFractionDigits: 0;)}}.

teacherSchedule.content_one: <0>{{count, number}} teacher</0> have filled in their <1>schedule data</1>. That’s {{percentage, number(style: percent; maximumFractionDigits: 0;)}} of all teachers.
teacherSchedule.content_other: <0>{{count, number}} teachers</0> have filled in their <1>schedule data</1>. That’s {{percentage, number(style: percent; maximumFractionDigits: 0;)}} of all teachers.

studentData.content_one: <0>{{count, number}} student</0> have filled <1>additional account information</1>. That’s {{percentage, number(style: percent; maximumFractionDigits: 0;)}} of all students with classrooms.
studentData.content_other: <0>{{count, number}} students</0> have filled <1>additional account information</1>. That’s {{percentage, number(style: percent; maximumFractionDigits: 0;)}} of all students with classrooms.
